name: Holey Cheese
description:
This was made in a week, for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1.

This game is about making parmesantastic cheese, and creating the ultimate Holey Cheese with the best holes ever! Upgrade your machines, manage production speeds, carefully calibrate your wHOLE factory to optimize earnings, enter contests, have a panic attack because of all the exclamation marks, and make the best cheese!

Has an in-game tutorial.

Credits

Silly Fun Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
